Gross monthly income refers to your income before deductions.
Net monthly income refers to your income after deductions.
Additional income refers to any income you receive apart from your monthly salary.
Monthly mortgage or bond repayment refers to your home loan installments
Rent is the cost of your monthly accommodation
Maintenance expenses refer to your monthly obligation to pay for statutory child etc.
Monthly Instalment of creditor account i.e: Credit Card, Personal Loan, Furniture Accounts etc.
Other expenses refer to groceries, transport, costs etc.
All fields are mandatory.\nIf not applicable, please enter R0.

resources.string: Please ensure that you are connected \nto the internet.
Your session expired. To continue please sign in or cancel to return to the rest of the app.
Critical Illness/Death Cover/Retrenchment etc. Submit a Claim
Your peace of mind is important to us, so we offer you comprehensive balance protection insurance on your Woolies Store Card, Credit Card or Personal Loan.
Covers you in the event of Death, Total Loss of Income, Critical Illness, Temporary and Permanent Disability.

Pays the outstanding balance on your account (provided it is not in arrears), up to a maximum of R100 000, in the event of your Death, Permanent Disability, or if you are diagnosed with a Critical Illness.
Pays your instalments for up to 12 months (provided it is not in arrears), up to a maximum of R100 000, in the event of Total Loss of Income or Temporary Disability.

For an extra monthly premium of only R13.70 per month, you can also take out additional death benefit, which pays R20 000 to your next of kin in the event of your death, to help them handle unforeseen expenses.
Balance protection insurance for your spouse or partner can also be arranged. An additional monthly premium will be charged.
We update these numbers every few hours. Stock moves quickly, so items may have sold since the last count.
Stores in this area are out of your item (or have very little stock).

Do any of the following apply to you?

• I’ve applied for insolvency debt counseling 
• I’ve applied for debt administration 
• I’m currently insolvent 
• I’m currently under debt review

We will try our best to ensure that you can afford the increased instalments of your new credit limit. As such we obtain your credit information from various credit bureaus, who maintains the personal details related to your credit history (repayment behaviour, amount of credit you have available, outstanding debt collections and other).
With credit applications, we may be required to verify your income. If so we may need 1 months payslip or bank statement.
Please check on the app to get regular updates as to your application progress.
Your credit limit increase has been approved and is now available. Happy shopping!
If the problem persists, call us on 0861 50 20 20
Check that your mobile data or WIFI is switched on and ensure that you’re connected to the internet. If the problem persists, call us on 0861 50 20 20
Take clear photos of your documents and email them to us at cliproofofincome@wfs.co.za. Your ID number will be your reference.
In order to complete your application, we require your latest 1 months’ bank statements or last months payslips.
Don’t have the required documents right now or need more detailed instructions? Simply click below and we will send an email to you, so you can complete the process
Please follow the instructions we’ve sent to your email. If you didn’t receive the email, please check your spam folder.

Your credit limit increase is subject to the condition that proof of income is provided within 30 (thirty) days from the date of accepting the credit limit increase. Submission outside this period will result in the lapse of the offer.\n\nIf your proof of income is lower than the amount you disclosed, we will re-calculate your credit limit increase amount and notify you accordingly. You will only have access to the credit limit increase once proof of income is received.

There are 4 easy ways to pay your account:
You can pay your Woolworths Personal Loan in any of the following ways:
Cover in the event of your Death, Total Loss of Income, Disability or Critical Illness.
Covers in the event of your Partner’s Death, Total Loss of Income, Disability or Critical Illness.
Helps pay for unforeseen expenses in the event of your death.
Helps pay for unforeseen expenses in the event of your partners death.

Pays the outstanding balance on your account (provided it is not in arrears), up to a maximum of R100 000, in the event of your Death, Permanent Disability, or if you are diagnosed with a Critical Illness.
Pays your instalments for up to 12 months, up to a maximum of R100 000, in the event of Total Loss of Income or Temporary Disability.
All cover ceases at the age of 65, except Death and Critical Illness.

Pays the outstanding balance on your account (provided it is not in arrears), up to a maximum of R100 000,in the event of your Partner’s Death, Permanent Disability, or if they are diagnosed with a Critical Illness.
Pays your instalments for up to 12 months, up to a maximum of R100 000, in the event of Total Loss of Income or Temporary Disability.
All cover ceases at the age of 65, except Death and Critical Illness.
Pays R20 000 cash to a nominated beneficiary when you pass away.
Helps your family handle any unforeseen expenses in the event of your passing.
Pays R20 000 cash to you or a nominated beneficiary when your partner or spouse passes away.
Helps your family handle any unforeseen expenses in the event of the passing of your partner or spouse.
Cover in the event of your death, retrenchments, disability or a critical illness.
Cover in the event of your death, disability, retrenchment or a critical illness.
Covers you in the event of your partners death.
Cover in the event of your death or a critical illness.
Covers you in the event of your partners death or a critical illness.
Pays the outstanding balance on your account (provided it is not in arrears) in the event of your death, permanent disability, or if you are diagnosed with a critical illness.
Pays your instalments for up to 12 months from the date you are retrenched or temporarily disabled.
Pays R2500 cash to a nominated beneficiary when you pass away due to natural causes or R5000 cash if your passing is accidental.
Helps your family handle any unforeseen expenses in the event of your passing.
Pays the outstanding balance on your account (provided it is not in arrears) in the event of your death, permanent disability, or if you are diagnosed with a critical illness.
Pays your instalments for up to 12 months from the date you are retrenched or temporarily disabled.
Pays the outstanding balance on your account (provided it is not in arrears) in the event of your partner’s death.
Pays the outstanding balance on your account (provided it is not in arrears) if your partner passes away or if your partner is diagnosed with a critical illness.
Pays the outstanding balance on your account (provided it is not in arrears) in the event of your death, or if you are diagnosed with a critical illness.

All The More Reason To join
WRewards is our way of rewarding customers instantly. Get access to exclusive Woolies savings throughout the year!
Savings on Woolies Favourites Every Day
Get instant savings on quality staples and best-loved products. Look out for the WRewards icon in the Daily Difference, in store and online or on the Woolies app.
You may get something extra on promos – be it early access to promos, additional savings or complimentary vouchers. Best of all, some promos will be exclusive to WRewards members.
Keep an eye out for vouchers that give you discount on items we think you’ll enjoy.
The best savings at Woolies every day:
Get instant savings on quality staples and best-loved products. Look out for the green WRewards icon on the Woolies app, in store, online or in the Daily Difference.
You may get something extra on promos - be it early access to promos, additional savings or complimentary vouchers. Best of all, some promos will be exclusive to WRewards members.
Keep an eye out for vouchers that give you discounts on items we think you’ll enjoy.
All The More Reason To Be A Vip
The more you shop, the more you are rewarded. Our VIPs get:
A welcome voucher of R75 off R350 on your next shop
To get to VIP status, spend R30 000 or more, annually.

Your annual spend will be calculated from the first Monday of each Woolworths financial year. This commences at the end of June or beginning of July and comes to an end on the last Sunday of the Woolworths financial year 12 months later.

You will be eligible for an upgrade in status level every month of the year. Downgrades only take place once, annually at the beginning of July, and are based on your spend during the previous 12 months.
We are entitled to adjust the spend thresholds (they are adjusted annually), the number of status levels or the rewards at any stage without notification.

Can’t find participating store close to you? Tap here to arrange delivery.
This Virtual Temporary In-Store Card (temp store card) is valid for 30 days.
Your temp store card can only be used for in-store purchases and not online purchases.
Your temp store card will be removed after your first in-store purchase with your plastic Store Card.

You can make a payment to your Store Card account at POS. Just advise the operator you would like to make a payment and they will take you through the process. Scan your card when asked. ID is not required to make a payment.
To get a refund, please advise the operator of your card number, which is contained in the app, and don’t scan the barcode. The operator will key enter your details and process your refund as normal.
The Woolworths Virtual Temp Store Card will only be usable within selected Woolies stores. You have been selected to enjoy this new feature. Feedback can be given at appfeedback@woolworths.co.za.
Scan your barcode to buy at a cashier or pay your account.
If processing a refund, please show your card details. Please remember your SA ID or Driver\'s license when using your virtual temp card.
Show card details to buy, get a refund or pay your account.

As long as you pay your account in full on or before the due date, no interest will be charged.

As a Woolies Store Cardholder, you’ll automatically become a WRewards member and get access to amazing benefits. Plus, pay with your Woolies card and get an extra 5% off selected WRewards offers.
2% back in quarterly vouchers on spend inside Woolworths.
Pay for your fuel with your Woolies Credit Card and get 0.75% back in WRewards quarterly vouchers.
We offer optional Balance Protection that benefits you or your loved ones in the event of your death, retrenchment, critical illness or disablility. Find out more.
Make larger purchases by using the budget facility. Funds from your straight account can be allocted to your budget facility so you can spread the payment of R300 or more over 6 to 60 months.
Up to 8 additional cards for your family or friends, at no extra cost.
Provides you and your immediate family with Assistance Services, when all travelling together on a journey outside your country of residence for a duration to 90 days.
Your Woolworths Credit Card is internationally recognised and accepted at 29 million merchants around the world, wherever you see the Visa sign.
1% back in quarterly vouchers on all purchases outside of Woolworths and fuel purchases when paying with your card (excludes EFT). Ts&Cs apply.
Pay for your fuel with your Woolies Credit Card and get up to 1% back in WRewards quarterly vouchers.
As a Woolies Store Cardholder, you’ll automatically become a WRewards member and get access to amazing benefits. Plus, pay with your Woolies card and get an extra 5% off selected WRewards offers.
We offer optional Balance Protection that benefits you or your loved ones in the event of your death, retrenchment, critical illness or disablility.

Up to 8 additional cards for your family or friends, at no extra cost.
Provides you and your immediate family with Assistance Services, when all travelling together on a journey outside your country of residence for a duration to 90 days.

As a Woolies Store Cardholder, you’ll automatically become a WRewards member and get access to amazing benefits. Plus, pay with your Woolies card and get an extra 5% off selected WRewards offers.
Shift make a difference to the additional benefits
Take charge of your budget. You decide how much to pay: whether you pay the full instalment, half of the outstanding balance or the full balance on your account.
Convenience all the way. Shop food, fashion, beauty and home and pay utility bills or buy airtime. Also use your card at any Woolies Foodstops at selected Engen.
2% back in quarterly vouchers on all your Woolies spend when you pay with your Woolies card.
Use your Woolworths Credit Card to draw cash at any ATM displaying the Visa logo, worldwide.
Get basic travel insurance if you are under the age of 75 and purchase an international airline ticket using your card.
Lost card protection covers you against the fraudulent use of both primary and secondary cards.
Get Back More with Woolies Black
3% back in quarterly vouchers on all Woolies purchases when you PAY with your Woolies Credit Card.
Get your free TASTE magazine voucher monthly
Get 2 Free Woolies coffee or tea vouchers monthly
If you pay with a Woolworths Black Credit Card on our website or app, all our regular delivery options are free (this excludes Express Delivery).
With a Woolies Personal Loan you can get up to R120 000 cash in your bank account within 48 hours of approval.
Access Funds You\'ve Already Paid Back
Make use of the funds you\'ve already paid back. You can also apply to increase your limit at any time.
Pay by a monthly debit order, at any Woolworths store, deposit into any Absa bank branch, or by Electronic Funds Transfer (EFT).
Flexible repayment terms of up to 60 months and flexibility to make additional payments or settle early.
4 ways we make your life easier
You can pay your woolworths credit card account in any of the following ways
Funds available for you to use.
Balance as at the current date.
This is the total amount of credit offered to you by Woolies.
The total amount due, is the total of that months due amount plus any previous over due amounts.
This is the date the Total Amount Due is to be paid by.
Account in arrears is when the minimum payment due is not paid in full by the due date.
This is the minimum amount that is due for the payment, by the due date for that month.
The amount that is outstanding from the previous billing due date
The total amount due, is the total of that months due amount plus any previous over due amounts.
This is the date the Total Amount Due is to be paid by.
Balance as at the date when you are billed.

Funds available for you to use.

You can pay your Woolies Credit Card using any of the following payment options:
Account Six Month In Arrear Toolbar
Withdraw cash at any ATM displaying the Visa logo. Withdrawals at any Absa ATM is free for Woolworths Black Credit Cardholders. Ts&Cs apply.
Welcome to the world of Woolies. It’s the next level in shopping, rewards and financial services.
Shop same day delivery with Woolies Dash, choose a timeslot with standard delivery, or use our Click & Collect and visit one of our stores.
Instantly save more. Sign up for WRewards on your phone, and access your virtual card, vouchers, and promotions on the go.
Access all your Woolworths financial products right here. View your balances, check your transaction history or apply for something new.
To purchase, please try find in-store or change location for delivery.
We always show you items available at the store closest to your location. When you change this location, the items you see may change too.

How to pay your Woolies account
Unable to pay your Woolies account
Unfortunately chat to us on WhatsApp is unavailable at the moment. Please try again later.
Your virtual temporary card is active for WRewards too, so you can scan it upfront and all your WRewards will work as normal.
Please let our operator know you will be using your temporary card and when prompted for payment, present the bar code to the scanner in the same way as a voucher.
To use your temp store card in store, please take along your South African ID every time you want to shop with your temp card.
Your temp store card cannot be used at Engen service stations.
If you receive any staff discounts, please make sure that your virtual card number is loaded correctly in other systems, like Peoplesoft.
If you have issues using you temporary card please contact Woolworths Financial Services at 0861 50 20 20 or by email at queries@wfs.co.za.
Click & Collect orders have a maximum limit of between %1$s and %2$s food items, store dependent.
You can easily pay your Woolies Store Card using\nany of the following payment options:
Pay your account now using a different debit card or credit card.
Pay your account by EFT or a direct payment into your Store Card account.
Pay your account at any branch of Absa Bank. Use your 16-digit Woolworths Card number as the bill account number.
Pay your account at any Woolworths store.
Pay your account at any South African bank ATM.
Save this card for future payments
* Payments may take up to 5 business days to reflect.
Follow the steps below when making a payment at an ATM.
Pay your account now using a debit card. This is the preferred method. Please see below for combination cards.
After inserting your card and PIN
Select 3rd party beneficiery or public recipient
Select Credit Card, Store Card or Personal Loan account
Complete details with your reference: Your 16 digit Woolworths account number (no spaces)

received the policy terms and conditions,
we will reverse any premiums paid,
provided have not claimed.

submit a claim, log a complaint, wish to cancel or
have not received your policy wording within 30

on 0861502020

resources.string: Has Your Card Not\nArrived in the Post?

We do our best to deliver all new cards within 30 days, but sometimes things go wrong. Please let us know if your card has not yet been delivered to you and a customer service agent will be in touch to arrange VIP delivery.
A customer service agent will be in touch to arrange VIP delivery.
We can’t seem to find you. Please enter number and name of your street ,or drag the pin to your exact location.

If you delete your profile, you won\'t be able to log into your account, view any account information, view history, or access any of our related apps.

If you delete your online profile, you won\'t be able to log in to your account, or access your order history. Deleting your online profile will not close any other accounts you have with Woolworths or Woolworths Financial Services.
